title: Part A
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions:
The response does not calculate Country A’s real GDP in 2021 as 44,000; does not calculate Country A’s real GDP per capita in 2021 as 400; and/or does not show the work.

Real GDP= 88,000 200 ×100=44,000 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4E38@

Real GDP per Capita= 44,000 110 =400 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@513C@

The response calculates Country A’s real GDP in 2021 as 44,000; calculates Country A’s real GDP per capita in 2021 as 400, and shows the work.

Real GDP= 88,000 200 ×100=44,000 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4E38@

Real GDP per Capita= 44,000 110 =400 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@513C@

title: Part B
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not state that the standard of living for the average person in Country A has stayed the same from 2020 to 2021 and/or does not explain that real GDP per capita in Country A did not change from 2020 to 2021.

The response states that the standard of living for the average person in Country A has stayed the same from 2020 to 2021 and explains that real GDP per capita in Country A did not change from 2020 to 2021.

title: Part C
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not state that an increase in government spending on education will promote economic growth in Country A and/or does not explain that human capital will increase and the labor force will become more productive.

The response states that an increase in government spending on education will promote economic growth in Country A and explains that human capital will increase and the labor force will become more productive.

title: Part D
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not accurately include either of the criteria below.
The response accurately includes the first criterion below, but not the second.
The response accurately includes both criteria below.
